keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
# remove vomnibar
unmap o
unmap O
unmap b
unmap B

# unmap /
# unmap n
# unmap N
# arc doesn't play well with empty new tab
unmap t

# unmap v
# I don't want to accidentally click these
unmap r
unmap x
